screenshot.alt: Screenshot of a .etng file in RM Easiteach Next Generation 1
screenshot.caption: ETNG file open in RM Easiteach Next Generation 1

description: The ETNG file is the main file type associated with Easiteach Next Generation. The file is created when a user saves a lesson by selecting File → Save or Save As... and chooses the ETNG format. ETNG files may also be saved as .JPG , .PDF , or IWB files.
To open an ETNG file, select File → Open and navigate to the location of the file.
NOTE: Easiteach Next Generation replaced Easiteach, which used .ET files to save lesson data.

images.alt: Screenshot of a .etng file in RM Easiteach Next Generation 1
images.caption: ETNG file open in RM Easiteach Next Generation 1
